Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.utilities

Class SpecialCharacterContainer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.utilities.SpecialCharacterContainer
public class SpecialCharacterContainer extends Object
This class is a simple interface to manage a GUI special character. Provides all the required methods to create and update it.
